title: Lynda.com - After Effects CS4 Essential Training + Exerc. Files
description:
After Effects is a digital motion graphics and compositing software application published by Adobe Systems. Its main purpose is for film and video post-production.  <a href="
http://www.adobe.com/products/aftereffects/features/?view=topnew" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.adobe.com/products/aftereffects/features/?view=topnew</a>


Video Tutorial


After Effects CS4 Essential Training
with: Chad Perkins


In After Effects CS4 Essential Training, Chad Perkins teaches fundamental motion graphics design techniques from the ground up. He shows how to gather video, audio, and graphical source materials into layered compositions, make edits and adjustments, then bring it all to life with a powerful array of visual effects and animation techniques. These skills are demonstrated in a series of increasingly intricate projects, from creating a galaxy to building a fantasy battle scene. Chad also demonstrates workflows for keying and compositing, shows how to integrate with other applications, shares useful tips and secrets, and much more. Exercise files accompany the tutorials for premium subscribers.


**PLEASE NOTE: THIS TORRENT INCLUDES BOTH VIDEO TUTORIAL AND EXERCISE FILES**


Topics include:

Introduction
Creating a Simple Project
Project and Importing Essentials
Using Compositions and Layers
Creating Animation
Understanding and Editing Video
The Power of Effects
Color-Correcting Footage
Creating and Animating Text
Creating Animated Digital Paint
Creating Animated Digital Drawings
Motion Paths
Intermediate Animation
Concealing with Masks and Keying
Compositing 101
Stabilizing and Tracking Motion
Working in 3D
Using Audio
Linking Audio Volume to Animation Properties
Precomposing and Nesting Compositions
Integrating with Other Adobe Applications
Exporting to Video and Media
Bringing It All Together
Conclusion


For more info (including samples), please see:  <a href="
http://movielibrary.lynda.com/html/modPage.asp?ID=715" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://movielibrary.lynda.com/html/modPage.asp?ID=715</a>

Enjoy!
